name: Gangs of Rikton
description:
You're back in Rikton City, freed from prison thanks to a mysterious stranger who now expects you to pay him back. For that, you will have to make a place for yourself in the middle of the underworld of Rikton City. What will be your destiny? Wealth and power? A return to prison? Or a one-way ticket to the morgue?


  • Produce weed and designer drugs like methamphetamine or ecstasy yourself!
  • Supply from stores and from unscrupulous employees or wholesalers.
  • Import cocaine and heroin through dynamically generated contacts, who will surely try to scam you.
  • Cut and retail drugs on the streets, but prepare to face the competition!


  • Sell your wares to people on the street, maybe some will become loyal (and bigger) customers.
  • Do business with the small dealers in your neighborhood, they will buy cheaper, but much more!
  • Meet other traffickers and buy or sell as needed.


  • Improve your hideout and buy new ones.
  • Improve your equipment to produce even more!


Your gang and territory management are very important features. Increase your production, your income and decrease micromanagement.
  • Find new recruits from your former clients, competitors, or through someone who knows the underworld of the city.
  • Send your men on missions or give them fixed tasks.
  • Each gangster is unique and will not be able to do any mission depending on their skills.
  • Eliminate the local gangs to appropriate their territory and no longer suffer from their competition!
  • Watch your men! Maybe they'll betray you to start their own gang or maybe they're undercover cops!
  • Diversify yourself, also do pimping and burglaries.


Gangs of Rikton is a game developed by a single developer. The focus was mostly on the gameplay more than on the graphics. If the graphics of Gangs of Rikton are honorable, it is above all a game with vast, deep and mature gameplay. You have been warned!
